titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend the limitation on waivers granted under section 212(h) of that Act to aliens unlawfully present in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/4/2000--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the waiver of inadmissibility for criminal aliens unlawfully present in the United States.
